author: Hasse Johansen
description: Vodka fortifies and supports a well-balanced blend of orange zest, apple, lemon and star anise.
name: The Heritage
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
30 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
